import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { RouterLink, RouterLinkActive } from '@angular/router'; import { IonicModule } from '@ionic/angular'; @Component({ selector: 'digitekisi-landing', templateUrl: './landing.component.html', standalone: true, imports: [IonicModule, RouterLink, RouterLinkActive] }) export class LandingComponent implements OnInit { constructor() { } ngOnInit() {} }
